reviewText: If you want to watch the real RED DWARF don't buy the remastered video's!  They are classic and hilarious shows but the effect where video looks like film really hurts the enjoyment.

Why did they have to remaster these videos when they were perfectly fine in the first place? I own the un-remastered editions of almost all the series between 1 and 7. Red Dwarf is my favorite show as well, but please  stop touching what doesn't need to be touched! Leave it alone!
